entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 30%
